text: Smith Wigglesworth (8 June 1859 â€“ 12 March 1947) was a English evangelist from Yorkshire. He was an important leader in early Pentecostalism. He was an illiterate plumber. He is said to have been used by God in healing people. ==Other websites== *Smith Wigglesworth Category:1859 births Category:1947 deaths Category:English Protestants Category:Pentecostals Category:People from Bradford Category:Plumbers
title: Smith Wigglesworth
